resources.string:
Enter the values in the grid by touching them.

The Green Button solves the sudoku with the hints you provided.

The red button resets the grid.

If you entered hints which do not lead to a unique solution,the solver will still show you one of the possible solutions.

Developed By : 


Safal Pandita

For suggestions email at :
safalpandita@gmail.com
